signatures.desc: Creates a coroutine without a receiver and with result type T. This function creates a new, fresh instance of suspendable computation every time it is invoked.

signatures.text: fun <R, T> (suspend R.() -> T).createCoroutine( receiver: R, completion: Continuation<T>): Continuation<Unit>
signatures.desc: Creates a coroutine with receiver type R and result type T. This function creates a new, fresh instance of suspendable computation every time it is invoked.
